data.title: Great salad bar!
data.text: So nice and clean since they remodeled years ago. The salad bar has so much variety and there are also meat dishes . The carnitas in the salad bar are sooo tasty, not to mention the homemade guacamole! The cheese bread is delivered in abundance to your table at no charge. Hamburgers and steaks are great as well!

data.title: Not that great
data.text:
Being on a low carb diet, Sizzler seemed like a good choice.  The place was pretty noisy.  The salad bar was well stocked and I was able to do well with it and stick to my diet.  I ordered a steak and vegetables to stay low on carbs.  The vegetables were a bit undercooked (which is better than overcooked) and the steak was not good at all.  It was quite tough and came rare when I ordered medium.  It took quite a while to come out so I didn't want to take the time to send it back.

Overall, not a great experience.

data.title: Good food at reasonable prices
data.text: I've been to this location for dinner several times and the food and service has been pretty consistent. The salad bar has a few items that I don't see at other sizzlers, such as the diced ham topping and beef stew soup (although the beef always runs out quick!). The steaks have always been good and cooked how requested. The service is sometimes so-so and some servers are more attentive than others. I have been here at various times during the weekdays and there is hardly ever a line and there is ample parking in their lot. Overall, an okay place to have dinner and conveniently located for me, so I'll be back.

data.title: excellent
data.text: Nous avons mangé au Sizzler  North Highland avenue qui se trouve à 5 min. de voiture du Chinese Theatre, on peut parquer devant, c'est très pratique. Excellente nourriture, bon rapport qualité/prix, grand buffet à volonté de salade et de nourriture mexicaine et dessert + un steak moyen avec 1 patate au four dans les 12 $.
